keyMoments.title: Akainu's Mysterious Introduction Before Marineford
keyMoments.description: Admiral Akainu stands before Fleet Admiral Sengoku in his office, shown as an enigmatic figure embodying 'Absolute Justice.' Unlike the other admirals, he receives no flashback sequences, deliberately maintaining his mysterious status.
keyMoments.significance: First significant appearance of Akainu in the Marineford context, establishing him as perhaps the most dangerous of the three admirals through his mysterious presentation.

reveals.information: Embodies 'Absolute Justice' - all business and concerned only with getting the job done
One of the Three Admirals assembling at Marineford to face Whitebeard
